generate_fictitious_data: Returns the generator consisting of objects of class FictousData, takes the number of repetitions, the average value of the age, if it needs to be generated, the type of generated data in a string format separated by commas, returns the generated data
name: Returns a random name
age: Returns a random age, with an average generation value as a parameter
city: Returns a random city depending on the country
generate_multiple: Returns the generator, takes the number of repetitions and functions
